title: 'Not Being Allowed To Speak In Parliament': PM Modi Slams Opposition On Notes Ban
description:
Prime Minister Narendra Modi today slammed the opposition for repeated disruptions in Parliament over the ban of old 500 and 1,000-rupee notes, and said he is not being allowed to speak in Lok Sabha. "The government has always said we are ready to debate. I am not being allowed to speak in Lok Sabha so I am speaking in the Jan Sabha," the PM told farmers at a rally in Gujarat's Deesa.
